name: Scrolling Space Shooter (Class Project)
description:
Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to shoot. Avoid the enemy ships, and shoot them down to get the high score!

This project was made as a group effort between Karna Errande, Prabhnoor Brar and myself.

This is a known bug where you loose control of the player if you click on any other object. You have to close and restart the game after game over.  Audio is not working in stand alone build at this time.
